code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const colorMap={'优':'#4caf50','良':'#8bc34a','轻度污染':'#ffc107','中度污染':'#ff9800','重度污染':'#f44336','严重污染':'#b71c1c'};const PollutionLegend=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.section,{initial:{opacity:0,y:40},whileInView:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.8},viewport:{once:true},style:{maxWidth:700,margin:'3rem auto',background:'#1c1c1c',padding:'1.5rem',borderRadius:'12px',color:'#ccc'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{fontSize:'1.4rem',marginBottom:'1rem'},children:"\u6C61\u67D3\u7B49\u7EA7\u989C\u8272\u56FE\u4F8B"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'grid',gridTemplateColumns:'repeat(6, 1fr)',gap:'0.75rem'},children:Object.entries(colorMap).map(_ref=>{let[label,color]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'100%',height:'40px',backgroundColor:color,borderRadius:'6px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginTop:'0.4rem',fontSize:'0.9rem'},children:label})]},label);})})]});};export default PollutionLegend;
